question: Who iagurates Project commencement of Barmer refinery?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the commencement of the work of an oil refinery in Rajasthan's Barmer district. It is being set up by HPCL-Rajasthan Refinery Ltd (HRRL). HRRL is a Joint Venture between Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Ltd and Rajasthan State Government. The entire project entails an investment worth over Rs 43000 crore.
